name: GenerateAnswerSummary
description:
Retrieve direct answers or detailed summaries with citations.

Use this tool to perform a search based on a query. It generates either a direct answer or a detailed summary with citations, depending on the nature of the query.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: The question or query to be answered or summarized.

value_schema.description: The question or query to answer.

parameters.name: enable_streaming_response
parameters.description: Return the response as a server-sent events (SSE) stream if set to true.

value_schema.description: If true, the response is returned as a server-sent events (SSS) stream.

parameters.name: include_full_text
parameters.description: If true, the response includes full text content in the search results.

value_schema.description: If true, the response includes full text content in the search results
